name: Pixepal
description:
Instructions

Click (or click 'n drag) any objects with a white outline to interact.

  • Left mouse × Interact
  • Arrow keys, W / A / S / D × Move around
  • Spacebar × Jump
Credits
  • Development: Kenney Vleugels
  • Game engine: Construct 2
  • Music: Eric Taylor

Made during Kenney Jam 2017 at Pixeland
